pipeline@160.label: Folder with habitat maps
pipeline@160.description: Folder with tif files (one per population) describing presence (1) or absence (0) of suitable habitat. Multiple layers can be used to describe habitat availability at different time points.

pipeline@161.label: Polygons of populations
pipeline@161.description: Path to geojson file storing polygons of populations.

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.description: resampled maps of cover, cover gain and cover loss map used to visualize cover dynamics in final plot
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.label: Cover, cover gain and cover loss map

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.description: Estimated Ne:Nc ratio for the studied species. Multiple values can be provided, separated by a comma.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.label: Ne:Nc ratio estimate

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.description: Estimated density of the population [number of individuals per km2]. Multiple values can be provided, separated by a comma.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.label: Population density

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.description: Set a name for the pipeline run.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.label: Title of the run
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.example: Quercus sartorii, Mexico, Habitat decline by tree cover loss, 2000-2023

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.description: Estimated effective size of every population, based on the latest time point of the habitat cover map.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.label: Effective population size

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.description: Estimated proportion of mantained populations, comparing earliest and latest time point. A value of 1 means that no populations went extinct over the time frame.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.label: Population maintained indicator

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.description: An interactive interface to explore indicators trends across geographical space and time.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.label: Interactive plot

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.description: Estimated proportion of populations with Ne>500 at latest time point.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_Indicators.yml@16.label: Ne>500 indicator

metadata.name: Calculate genetic diversity indicators
metadata.description: Component of the Genes from Space tool. Given poylgons of population distribution (geojson format) and a raster stack describing habitat availability over time (geotiff format), the pipeline returns genetic diversity loss indicators (Ne500 and Populations Maintained indicator), displayed through an interactive interface.
